item.title: The Ultimate Complete Final Social Media Sizing Cheat Sheet
item.description:
The Ultimate Complete Final Social Media Sizing Cheat Sheet

Ever wondered what all the sizes are for all your social media sites ? Well here you go.

item.title: Is your site ready?
item.description:
Is your site ready?

Google today announced it is rolling out an update to mobile search results in May that "increases the effect" of its mobile-friendly ranking signal. The goal is to "help our users find even more pages that are relevant and mobile-friendly," though the company didn't share exactly how much of an impact it expects the change to have.

item.title: Remembering Prince: What The Purple One Can Teach You About Creativity
item.description:
Remembering Prince: What The Purple One Can Teach You About Creativity

Join Entrepreneur and today's most influential business innovators in Denver, May 4. Register Now " Prince, a pioneering musician and creative, died today at 57. This game-changing artist merged his special take on funk and rock into 39 albums, creating classics such as Purple Rain and Little Red Corvette.
